description: This table contains information related to results entered on a specimen's anatomic pathology result.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: AP_RES_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The note type category ID for this AP specimen result note.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Grossing


Intra-Op


Final Diagnosis

columns.name: AP_RES_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of this AP specimen result note.

columns.name: AP_RES_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category ID for this AP specimen result note.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Started


In Progress


Complete
